title: Handloom Utsav: A celebration of India's Handlooms (Ministry of Textiles of the Republic of India) ...
text: ( Source : Ministry of Textiles of the Republic of India ) To be inaugurated at 11.30 AM on October 16 , 2015 Indian handlooms are known for their unique creativity and variety of colours and textures. The profession of handloom weaving has
